official_title: A bill to rename a reservoir and dam in the Central Valley project, California, as the "Trinity Lake" and the "Clair Engle Dam".

summary.text: Renames a reservoir and a dam in the Central Valley project, California, as Trinity Lake and Clair Engle Dam.
